name: markdown-docs
title: Markdown Documents
description: Manage and search markdown cheatsheets and documents
author: craigharman

commands.name: list-documents
commands.title: Browse Documents
commands.description: Browse, search, and manage your markdown documents

commands.name: quick-search
commands.title: Quick Search
commands.description: Search within documents using shortcuts (e.g., 'ags: character')

preferences.name: syncFolder
preferences.title: Storage Folder
preferences.description: Folder for storing documents. Defaults to iCloud Drive if not set.

preferences.name: defaultEditor
preferences.title: Default Editor
preferences.description: Application to open documents in (e.g., 'Visual Studio Code'). Leave empty for system default.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
